marketplace.title: Courses and Retraining

marketplace.demo_data: Demo data: These are sample courses for demonstration. Real courses will be available soon.
marketplace.funding_title: Retraining Courses from the Labor Office

marketplace.login_to_enroll_alert: Please log in first to register.

auth.login_desc: Log in to access your profile.
auth.register_desc: Start your career journey with JobShaman.

logistics.title: Commute Logistics
logistics.relocation_desc: This position requires moving or being a digital nomad.
logistics.too_far_desc: Distance {{distance}} km is impractical for daily commuting.
logistics.unknown_location_desc: System was unable to determine the location accurately.

page_hero.title_end: calculates if the job is really worth it for you.
page_hero.subtitle: Focus on what matters. JobShaman handles the math. Real income, commute, time and impact on your well-being ‚Äî all in one place.

page_what_is.desc_1: JobShaman is not a job portal. It's not a career coach. It's not an AI that writes your cover letter.
page_what_is.desc_2: JobShaman is math. It's reality. It's your net income after deducting taxes, insurance and commute costs.
page_what_is.desc_3: We manually analyze every job offer. We evaluate the real impact on your life ‚Äî not just what the company wanted to write.
page_what_is.card_1_desc: No guessing. Every job is analyzed according to clear criteria.
page_what_is.card_2_desc: You see all calculations. Nothing happens in a black box.
page_what_is.card_3_desc: Algorithms where data exists. AI where there is no other solution.
page_what_is.desc_4: We are the only portal that analyzes a user's profile based on skills and can offer a suitable course to improve their position in the labor market or to get their dream job.

page_why.desc_1: Companies promise "attractive salary", "flexibility" and "growth". Job ads are written to please you. But what is the reality?
page_why.desc_2: When I was designing JHI (Job Happiness Index), I didn't look for inspiration in corporate tables, but in Bhutan. Their "Gross National Happiness" index taught me that prosperity without inner comfort and meaning is empty. So I took their approach and applied it to the labor market ‚Äî I measure what really affects people.
page_why.time_desc: Commuting isn't just distance. It's 5 hours a week that you'll never see again.
page_why.money_desc: Commuting isn't just about time. Every kilometer costs money that you could use better.
page_why.reason: The difference is essential: where reality can be calculated, we don't estimate it.

page_ai.title: When we use AI ‚Äì and when we don't
page_ai.intro_end: uses AI only where it makes sense. Algorithms where data exists. AI where there is no other solution.
page_ai.important: The difference is essential: where reality can be calculated, we don't estimate it.

page_cta.subtitle: No long registrations. No clicking through three pages. Only data.

profile.cv_analyze_ready: CV file is ready for analysis
profile.upload_cv_desc: Upload a PDF, DOC or DOCX file (max 10MB) for automatic analysis of skills and experience
profile.cv_analysis_desc: Your CV will be automatically processed to extract skills, experience and education. This data helps us better match your profile to job requirements.
profile.no_experience: You have no work experience yet
profile.delete_account_desc: Permanently delete your account and all associated company data. This action cannot be undone.
profile.delete_account_warning_desc: This action is irreversible. All your data, profile, and history will be permanently deleted.
profile.delete_account_success: Your account has been successfully deleted.
profile.delete_account_error: Failed to delete account. Please try again or contact support.

seo.base_title: JobShaman - Intelligent job offers in Czechia
seo.home_description: Find your ideal job with AI analysis. JobShaman offers transparent job ads with real salaries, benefits and JHI score. Filter by location, benefits and companies.
seo.marketplace_description: Discover courses and retraining for your career. Online training, certifications and educational programs in Czechia.
seo.profile_description: Manage your profile, saved positions and preferences on JobShaman. Personalized job recommendations.
seo.company_dashboard_description: Publish job ads and analyze candidates with AI. JobShaman for companies - modern recruitment with transparency and data.
seo.job_detail_description: Details for position {{title}} at {{company}}. Salary: {{salary}}. Location: {{location}}. Benefits: {{benefits}}.
seo.home_description_simple: AI that reads between the lines.
seo.ai_summary_home: JobShaman is a Czech platform for job seeking with AI analysis. It offers transparent job ads with real salaries, benefits and unique JHI score. You can filter by location, benefits and companies.
seo.ai_summary_job: Details for position {{title}} at {{company}}. Offer {{salary}} at location {{location}}. Benefits include: {{benefits}}.
seo.ai_summary_company: JobShaman for companies allows publishing job ads, candidate analysis with AI and transparent recruitment processes.
seo.ai_summary_default: JobShaman - modern platform for job seekers in Czechia with AI analysis and transparency.

portal.title: Company Portal
portal.subtitle: Recruitment without the gloss, data without bias.

dashboard.title: Recruitment Overview
dashboard.subtitle: Statistics for the whole company and individual recruiters.
dashboard.empty_state_desc: No data. Create your first job ad and start recruitment.

ai_insights.low_match_warning: Low AI match ({{avg}}% average). We recommend adjusting the working time description in the ad.

actions.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this position?
actions.confirm_close: Are you sure you want to mark this position as closed?

settings.mission_placeholder: Why does your company exist? What impact do you have on the world?

ad_editor.title: Offer Editor
ad_editor.placeholder_description: Describe the position, requirements, and what you offer...
ad_editor.heading: Heading
ad_editor.fill_required: Please fill in both the position name and description.
ad_editor.publish_success: The ad has been sent for review and will be published soon!

assessments_tab.desc: Create and manage AI assessments for candidates.

candidates.no_candidates_desc: Once you publish an offer, candidate profiles with calculated match scores will start appearing here.

seo.home_description: Find your ideal job with AI analysis.

metrics.impact_desc: This is work broken down into impacts.

financial.title: Financial Reality
financial.desc: How much you really have left each month. After taxes, mandatory deductions, and commuting costs.
financial.hint: No 'up to 60,000 CZK'. Just net income in the real world.

commute.title: Commute Impact
commute.desc: Commuting is not just distance. It's time, money, fatigue, and long-term impact on life.

jhi.title: JHI ‚Äì Job Happiness Index
jhi.desc: One number that summarizes five dimensions of work life: income, time, stability, flexibility, and load.
jhi.hint: Inspiration comes from Bhutan's Gross National Happiness index. We don't rate companies. We rate the impact of work on the person.

transparency.title: Transparency Score
transparency.desc: Some ads are fair. Others are just well-written.
transparency.hint: We analyze language, ambiguities, and missing information. The less fog, the higher the score.

gov_1.title: Electrician - Installation Electrical Activity
gov_1.desc: Course for obtaining a certificate of professional competence for installation electrical activities. High demand in the labor market.

gov_2.title: Driving License Group C+E
gov_2.desc: Professional driving license for freight transport. Retraining course with placement guarantee.

com_1.title: Java Backend Developer Certificate
com_1.desc: Complete backend application development course in Java with certification. Job placement guarantee.

com_2.title: Python for Data Science
com_2.desc: Modern Python course focused on data analysis, machine learning and AI. Ideal for career growth.

activity.added_comment: {{name}} added a comment to {{target}}

hero.subtitle: Modern recruitment platform with AI candidate analysis, Assessment Center, and intelligent job ad optimization. Stop wasting time with unsuitable applicants.

assessment.title: AI Assessment Center
assessment.desc: Intelligent candidate evaluation using AI analysis of responses, skills and cultural fit

analysis.title: Candidate Analysis
analysis.desc: Detailed candidate profiling including turnover risk analysis and team compatibility

optimization.title: AI Ad Optimization
optimization.desc: Automatic improvement of job ad text for maximum attractiveness and reaching higher quality candidates

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics
analytics.desc: Detailed overviews of ad effectiveness, candidate demographics and recruitment costs

transparent.title: Transparency and Fair Play
transparent.desc: Verification of information in ads and elimination of deceptive practices in recruitment

posting.title: Ad Management
posting.desc: Simple creation and publishing of job ads with formatting, emojis, and benefit selection.

insights.title: Benefit Insights
insights.desc: Find out which benefits candidates value most and tailor your offer.

dashboard.title: Usage Overview
dashboard.desc: Track the usage of AI optimizations and assessments within your subscription.
